EmailTemplate.name: Event - Accelerate 2014 - 2014.09.18.Email - TaaS Confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: Your registration for Tosca as a Service
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=edit me}},
Thank you for signing up for a free 30 day trial for our soon-to-be-launched Tosca as a Service offering.
You will receive an E-Mail invite to your account within 24 hours.
Thanks, The Tosca as a Service Team
To learn more, visit http://www.tricentis.com or follow us on LinkedIn <http://www.linkedin.com/company/tricentis-technology-&-consulting-gmbh>, Twitter <https://twitter.com/tricentis> or Facebook <https://www.facebook.com/TRICENTIS>.
